definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: sell (NH id.; Ph. [[מכר]]; Zinj. [[מכרו]] price, DHM:Sendsch. 60; Aram. mkar, [[מְכַר]] marry (i.e. buy as a wife); cf. As. makkûru, namkur(r)u, nakkuru, possession, property, Dl:HWB 408);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. ´[[מ]] Le 27:20 + 2 t.; sf. [[מְכָרוֹ]] Ex 21:37 + 2 t.; 1 s. [[מָכַרְתִּי]] Is 50:1 + 2 t., etc.; Impf. [[יִמְכּׂר]] Ex 21:7 +, etc.; Imv. [[מִכְרָ֫ה]] Ge 25:31; fs. [[מִכְרִי]] 2Ki 4:7; Inf. abs. [[מָכׂר]] De 14:21, De 21:14; cstr. [[מְכוֹר]] Ne 10:32; sf. [[מָכְרָהּ]] Ex 21:8; [[מִכְרָם]] Am 2:6, Ne 13:15 (cf. Ba:NB 104); Pt. [[מׂכֵר]] ([[מוֹכֵר]]) Le 25:16 + 3 t.; f. [[מׂכֶרֶת]] Na 3:4, etc.;—sell (c. [[בְּ]] pret. Am 2:6, Joe 4:3, Ps 44:13) sq. acc. e.g. land Ge 47:20, Ge 47:22 (J), Le 25:14 (acc. cogn.), v:Le 25:25 (H; sq. [[מֵאֲחֻזׇּתוֹ]]) cf. Ez Eze 48:14 (sq. [[מִן]] partit.), Le 25:15 (no obj. expr.), so v:Le 25:27; Le 27:20 (H), Ru 4:3; house Le 25:29 (H); beast Ex 21:35, Ex 22:1 (E); flesh De 14:21 (no obj.); crop Le 25:16 (H); food Ne 10:32, Ne 13:15, Ne 13:16, cf. v:Ne 13:20 (sq. [[מִמְכָר]]); oil 2Ki 4:7; linen Pr 31:24; birthright Ge 25:31, Ge 25:33 (J); most oft. human beings, e.g. as slaves Ge 37:27, Ge 37:28, Ge 37:36, Ge 45:4, Ge 45:5 (all JE), Ex 21:16 (E), De 21:14, De 21:14, De 24:7, cf. Am 2:6, Ne 5:8, Zec 11:5, Joe 3:3, Joe 3:6, Joe 3:7, Joe 3:8, Joe 3:8; esp. daughters Ex 21:7, Ex 21:8 (E); in marriage Gn Ge 31:15 (E); Pt. = seller Is 24:2, Ez Eze 7:12, Eze 7:13; fig., obj. truth Pr 23:23; of Nineveh, selling nations [[גּוֹיִם]] Na 3:4; esp. ´[[י]] selling his people (to enemies), i.e. giving it entirely into their power: De 32:30, Ps 44:13, Is 50:1, also ([[בְּיַד]] ´[[מ]]) Ju Jdg 2:14, Jdg 3:8, Jdg 4:2, Jdg 10:7, 1Sa 12:9; cf. Ju Jdg 4:9 (Sisera to woman); also Ez Eze 30:12 (del. Co after B al.)

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נִמְכַּר]] Le 25:48 + 5 t., etc.; Impf. [[יִמָּכֵר]] Le 25:34 + 3 t., etc.; Inf. [[הִמָּֽכְרוֹ]] Le 25:50; Pt. pl. [[נִמְכָּרִים]] Ne 5:8; —be sold, of land Le 25:23, Le 25:34; beast Le 27:27; cf. v:Le 27:28 (all P); of human beings as slaves Ex 22:2 for ([[בְּ]]) theft (E), Le 25:42 (P), Ps 105:17, Es 7:4; sell oneself Le 25:39, Le 25:47, Le 25:48, Le 25:50 (PH), De 15:12, Je 34:14, Ne 5:8, Ne 5:8; fig. of Isr., sold by ´[[י]], Is 50:1 for ([[בְּ]]) their sins, Is 52:3; cf. Es 7:4 = given over to death.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הִתְמַכֵּר]] 1Ki 21:25; [[וְהִתְמַכַּרְתֶּם]] consec. De 28:68; [[וַיִּתְמַכְּרוּ]] 2Ki 17:17; Inf. [[הִתְמַכֶּרְְ]] 1Ki 21:20; sell oneself as slave De 28:68; fig. 1Ki 21:20, 1Ki 21:25, 2Ki 17:17, all sq. [[לַעֲשׂוֹת הָרַע]].
